definitions.body: seer, c. art. ´[[הָר]]: (exc. 2Sa 15:27);—old name for [[נׇבִיא]] 1Sa 9:9 b, used of Sam. v:1Sa 9:9 a, v:1Sa 9:11, v:1Sa 9:18, v:1Sa 9:19 and (as archaism) 1Ch 9:22, 1Ch 26:28, 1Ch 29:29; of [[חֲנׇנִי]] 2Ch 16:7, 2Ch 16:10; [[הֲרוֹאֶה]] appar. of Zadok 2Sa 15:27, but crpt. (conj. In We Dr); pl. (c. prep.) [[לָרׂאִים]] Is 30:10 the seers, as a class.
